game.name: Lab BreakOut
game.shortDescription: Lab BreakOut is a hardcore precision gravity-shifting platformer with minimal graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lab BreakOut is a hardcore precision gravity-shifting platformer with minimal graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: Where's the rest of the game? Chapters 2 and 3 are "coming soon" and not even the boss/final level of Chapter 1 is present. 2 years later, I doubt it'...
Lab Breakout is a Unity asset flip from known asset flippers, Piece of Voxel. These guys make a living out of taking real developers work from asset p...
